examples: Moreover, it is a movement that is all-embracive, all-inclusive and all about ensuring no one falls between the cracks.
All-inclusives are a great option for families, in particular, with kids.
All-inclusives offer more amenities than you'll actually use, and they bank on that.
Demand for all-inclusive resorts rose to 14% in 2014 from 8% in 2011.
According to a 2018 study from the UK's Post Office, UK families spend an average of $980 on top of the price of their all-inclusive.
words.defineEn: including everyone or everything, particularly for a single price
words.defineVi: bao gồm tất cả mọi người hoặc tất cả mọi thứ, đặc biệt với một mức giá duy nhất

words.defineEn: the time of year during which people travel a lot and prices are very high
words.defineVi: thời gian trong năm mà mọi người đi du lịch nhiều và giá cả rất cao

words.defineEn: the time of year during which there is not much travel or business
words.defineVi: thời gian trong năm mà không có nhiều du lịch hoặc kinh doanh

examples: The rich businessman owned multiple luxurious cars.
The velvety texture of meunière butter adds a luxurious finish to mashed potatoes.
He made a luxurious bread sauce with warm milk and spices.
I stayed at a luxurious hotel during my vacation.
The couple enjoyed a luxurious vacation, but knew that their credit card bill would be waiting for them at home.
words.defineEn: extremely comfortable, particularly when expensive things are involved
words.defineVi: cực kỳ thoải mái, đặc biệt là khi những thứ đắt tiền có liên quan

examples: I hear that the new restaurant around the corner really sets the bar for exquisite seafood.
Yesterday, Emily dressed in her Sunday best for the wedding ceremony, radiating beauty and charm in her exquisite gown.
The crust is exquisite.
The preparations are exquisite.
To us, it was a land of Fujiyama, of cherry trees, exquisite gardens, Geisha girls, picturesque peasants.
words.defineEn: very beautiful; finely made
words.defineVi: rất đẹp; tinh xảo

examples: As adventurous eaters, they tried a variety of exotic foods but drew the line at kidneys.

He scratches his itch for adventure by traveling to exotic destinations.
I found a vendor who was selling exotic fruit marmalades.
The children were excited to try the unusual-looking dragon fruit, an exotic accessory fruit.

words.defineVi: có nguồn gốc từ một quốc gia khác, đặc biệt là một quốc gia nhiệt đới

words.defineEn: an arrangement to live as a foreign vacationer or student in someone's home
words.defineVi: một sự sắp xếp để sống như một du khách nước ngoài hoặc sinh viên trong nhà của một ai đó

words.defineEn: a vacation that one spends at or near one's home instead of traveling somewhere
words.defineVi: một kỳ nghỉ mà một người dành ở hoặc gần nhà của một người thay vì đi du lịch ở đâu đó

examples: And so, that was my outing.
Which brings us to another aspect of art, a big one: art as expression, or an outing of what is inside you.
Something that I do with a lot of my clients is, Part of our work together will be outings.
So if breaks didn’t have a tangible benefit, like an outing with coworkers, then folks didn’t seem to take one.

Maybe they need someone to take them on an outing if they're an inpatient and they just want some extra support because as you work your way through the levels when you're in an inpatient ward, they can offer you outings with family members and friends who are supportive of your recovery.
words.defineEn: a pleasure or educational trip that may last a day
words.defineVi: một niềm vui hoặc chuyến đi giáo dục có thể kéo dài một ngày

examples: The lunch invitation was clearly a fishing expedition to obtain information about his private life.
They worried about an FBI fishing expedition.
nly two members of the expedition lived to tell the tale.

When supplies ran low during the mountaineering expedition, the climbers realized that hunger breaks stone walls and undertook increasingly dangerous descents to forage for food.
words.defineEn: a trip that has been organized for a particular purpose such as a scientific or military one or for exploration
words.defineVi: một chuyến đi đã được tổ chức cho một mục đích cụ thể như khoa học hoặc quân sự hoặc để khám phá

examples: We found the President's itinerary in your desk.

When I got the itinerary from the Thunderbirds, and I started reading stuff, and it said things like, get plenty of sleep, I was like, oh, I haven't really done that.

words.defineVi: loại phòng thấp nhất được cung cấp trong khách sạn, trên máy bay hoặc tàu

examples: You can always upgrade a bit further down the road if you want.

words.defineVi: cung cấp cho ai đó một chỗ ngồi tốt hơn trên máy bay hoặc một phòng tốt hơn trong khách sạn so với phòng mà họ đã trả tiền

examples: But this wasn't your ordinary long-haul trip.

examples: I completed my degree in biochemistry and embarked on a career in education, but I always knew that the tail was wagging the dog.

examples: He got a sunburn on his arm after spending the day at the beach.

examples: - I like a smooth tan look.
